programme.title: Shark Attack Files
programme.desc: Paul de Gelder ja James Glancy hyppaavat lentokoneesta kilometrin korkeudesta kokeillakseen millaista on syoksya maailman kaukaisimmille haita kuhiseville vesille.

programme.title: Great White Kill Zone: Guadalupe
programme.desc: Guadalupen isot valkohait valjastetaan kameroilla ennenkuulumattoman pitkaksi 18 tunnin ajaksi. Nain paastaan haiden metsastysmaille ja seuraamaan saalistusta lahelta.

programme.title: Meet The Orangutans
programme.desc: Seuraa orpojen orankivauvojen elamaa Borneossa, kun ne tuodaan kasvamaan maailman vanhimpaan orankien turvapaikkaan ennen kuin ne palautetaan takaisin luontoon.

programme.title: Meet The Orangutans
programme.desc: Seuraa orpojen orankivauvojen elamaa Borneossa, kun ne tuodaan kasvamaan maailman vanhimpaan orankien turvapaikkaan ennen kuin ne palautetaan takaisin luontoon.

programme.title: Shark Attack Files
programme.desc: Craig OConnell ja Andy Casagrande seilaavat Serenajokea ylavirtaan ja yrittavat selvittaa, miksi nuoret harkahait uivat joelle, ja miten ne valttavat siella elavat krokotiilit.

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Matka maailman ympari nayttaa, miten koirasta tuli maailman arvostetuimpiin elaimiin kuuluva laji. Ihmisen parhaan ystavan tarina kulkee villipedosta lempeaksi lemmikiksi.

programme.title: Gamechangers: Inventing The World
programme.desc: Ohjelmassa seurataan alansa parhaita ja alykkaimpia tutkijoita, insinooreja, yrittajia ja keksijoita, jotka tekevat uraauurtavaa tyota etsiessaan seuraavia mullistavia keksintoja.

programme.title: Ihmeelliset elaimet
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 3. Elaimet tekevat uskomattomia asioita, mutta oletko koskaan pohtinut miten tai miksi? Sarjassa vastatataan kiehtovimpiin elainaiheisiin kysymyksiin. Kuinka elefantti kuuntelee jaloillaan? Enta miksi koira heiluttaa hantaansa? (How Do Animals Do That?, dokumentti, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Houstonin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Elainsuojeluyhdistyksen tutkija Sage Whitney on kuin tulisilla hiililla Teksasin auringossa joutuessaan pelastamaan auton moottoriin juuttunutta kissaa.

programme.title: Houstonin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Houstonin elainsuojeluyhdistyksen laakintatiimi joutuu tahan mennessa suurimpaan haasteeseen kahden orin ryhtyessa taisteluun.

programme.title: Houstonin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Dokumentaarisessa sarjassa seurataan Houstonin elainsuojeluyhdistyksen tyota kaltoinkohdeltujen elainten hyvaksi.

programme.title: Houstonin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Dokumentaarisessa sarjassa seurataan Houstonin elainsuojeluyhdistyksen tyota kaltoinkohdeltujen elainten hyvaksi.

programme.title: Meet The Penguins
programme.desc: Alamittaisen hylatyn poikasen tilanne nayttaa huonolta. Neljan kuukauden jalkeen Little Bluey painaa vain nipin napin yli kilon. Hoitajat tekevat kaikkensa, mutta riittaako se?

programme.title: Meet The Penguins
programme.desc: Leopardien iso hyokkays Kapkaupungin lahella tappaa kolmekymmenta pingviinia. Riistanvalvojat kiidattavat ainoan eloonjaaneen Sanccobiin, mutta jaako se henkiin?

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Kausi 5, osa 7. Denverin periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin. (Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin.

programme.title: Gamechangers: Inventing The World

programme.title: Adrift: 47 Days with Sharks
programme.desc: Toisen maailmansodan lentajat Louis Zamperini ja Russell Phillips selviytyivat 47 paivaa haita kuhisevilla vesilla heidan koneensa pudottua Tyyneen Valtamereen.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Kun koditon mies pyytaa turvapaikkaa ottamaan hanen koiranpentunsa, alkavat Mariah ja Marcel auttaa kadulla koiriensa kanssa elavia kodittomia jakamalla heille avustuspusseja.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kissojen kayttaytymista tutkiva Jackson Galaxy auttaa epatoivoisia kissanomistajia, joiden kodit ja ihmissuhteet ovat riekaleina naiden hurjien lemmikkien vuoksi.

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 3. Biologi, kalastaja ja tutkimusmatkailija Jeremy Wade matkustaa ympari maailmaa tutkimaan vesistoja ja vesielamaa. Tutkimuskohteisiin lukeutuvat muun muassa havainnot myyttisista vesihirvioista seka alueet, joilta tietyt kalalajit ovat yhtakkia kadonneet. (Jeremy Wades Dark Waters, dokumenttisarja, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: Kalamies ja tutkimusmatkailija Jeremy Wade etsii Italian Garda-jarvelta 1500-luvun hirviokalaa. Millaisia salaisuuksia jarven pinnan alle katkeytyy?

programme.title: Elamaa Tsernobylin jalkeen
programme.desc: Ensimmaisena tayden paasyn Tšernobylin vaara-alueelle saaneet tiedemiehet tutkivat, miten 30 vuoden takainen onnettomuus on vaikuttanut maailman saastuneimman ympariston elamaan.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Akvaarionrakentajat Wayde ja Brett tuntevat itsensa isanmaallisiksi, kun olympiakoripalloilija Paul George tilaa kaksi akvaariota uima-altaalleen, ennen paluutaan Rion kisoista.

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: Kalastaja ja tutkimusretkeilija Jeremy Wade etsii Australiasta makeanveden petokalaa, jonka uskotaan kuolleen sukupuuttoon. Mutta mita han loytaakaan?

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: Fisherman and adventurer, Jeremy Wade, travels to South Africa, in search of some of the world’s most unusual fish. What will he discover?

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: Greg Pierson ei ole koskaan kayttanyt asetta, mutta lahtee nyt metsastamaan vuoristovuohia. Samalla toiset ryhmat keraavat ruokaa talven varalle.

programme.title: Shark Attack Files

programme.title: Wild Mexico
programme.desc: Wild Mexico

programme.title: Villi Australia
programme.desc: Australian mantereella sijaitsee maailman suurin kesyton luonnonalue. Alkuperaiskansat ovat elaneet siella tarkkailemalla luontoa ja ottamalla siita oppia.

programme.title: Villi Australia
programme.desc: Australian mantereella sijaitsee maailman suurin kesyton luonnonalue. Alkuperaiskansat ovat elaneet siella tarkkailemalla luontoa ja ottamalla siita oppia.

programme.title: Wild Dubai
programme.desc: Modernin Dubain taakse katkeytyy salaisuus: uskomaton villi luonto, joka kantaa ajatonta yhteytta aavikkoon, mereen ja kansan historiaan ja perinteeseen.

programme.title: Gamechangers: Inventing The World
programme.desc: Ohjelmassa seurataan alansa parhaita ja alykkaimpia tutkijoita, insinooreja, yrittajia ja keksijoita, jotka tekevat uraauurtavaa tyota etsiessaan seuraavia mullistavia keksintoja.

programme.title: Saba And The Rhinos Secret
programme.desc: Seikkaileva villielainten asiantuntija Saba Douglas-Hamilton lahtee erikoiselle matkalle: paljastamaan sarvikuonon todellisen luonteen ja salaisen elaman.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 2, osa 10. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Scaled
programme.desc: Greg ja Lucas vierailevat perheessa, joka haluaa ensimmaiselle matelijalleen saluuna-teemaisen terraarion. Tyrone, Jason, Chris ja Lucas kilpailevat hauskimmasta meemi-kuvasta.

programme.title: Kotielainten pelastaja
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 4/11. Dan McKernan jatti kaupunkielaman taakseen, muutti Michiganin maaseudulle ja perusti maatilalleen elainsuojelualueen. Sarjassa otetaan katsaus tilan sydanta lammittaviin pelastustarinoihin ja jokapaivaiseen elamaan. (Saved By The Barn, tosi-tv, USA, 2020)

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Wayden ja Brettin perheet kilpailevat siita, kumpi rakentaa hurjimman ja erikoisimman lammikon takapihalleen - ja vain yksi voi voittaa!

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: PSPCA:n elainlaakarit hoitavat huskyn niskassa olevaa syvaa haavaa. Kaksi koiraa pelastetaan hylatylta takapihalta, jonne ne oli jatetty myrskyn jalkoihin ilman suojaa.

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: PSPCA:n virkailijat epailevat, etta eras mies kasvattaa koiranpentuja kellarikerroksessa Philadelphiassa. Olosuhteet ovat ala-arvoiset, ja tiimi aikoo lopettaa touhun.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Kausi 2 osa 10/13. Osa kaupunkilaisista on kyllastynyt hetkisen maailman sykkeeseen ja haluaa muttaa maalle. Maaseudulla asumisessa on kuitenkin erilaisia haasteita. Niinpa apuun kiitaa eras erityinen perhe. (Homestead Rescue, lifestyle, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Ystavykset matkaavat syvalle Sambiaan tiikerikalasta tehtyjen havaintoja seuraten. Edessa on liki 650 kilometria soratieta, krokotiileja, virtahepoja ja pulaa polttoaineesta.

programme.title: Canopy Kings
programme.desc: Puumajoja tilaustyona rakentava Django Kroner aloittaa uuden rakennuksen Kentuckyssa. Asiakas haluaa majan yli 20 metrin korkeuteen, joten Django lahtee ottamaan oppia sirkuksesta.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Gregilla ja Dinalla on kolme suloista lasta ja yksi ilkea kissa nimelta Mia. Chris ja Tenille eivat pysty muuttamaan yhteen Tenillen vihamielisen kissan tahden.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins

programme.desc: Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: ! Kausi 1, osa 1. Suunnittelija Antonio Ballatore rakastaa elaimia. Hanen intohimonaan on yhdessa tiiminsa kanssa kunnostaa ransistyneita ja ahtaita koteja seka niiden pihoja uuteen, elain- ja ihmisystavallisempaan kuosiin. (Animal Cribs, lifestyle, USA, 2017)

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: Joukkueen jasen on poissa pelista, ja Russellin ja Mireyan on jatkettava vihjeiden etsimista keskenaan. Ensimmaiset potentiaaliset todisteet isojalasta loytyvat.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Seitsenlapsinen Brownien perhe elaa syvalla Alaskan eramaassa, sivilisaation ja sahkoverkkojen ulkopuolella, missa selviytyminen riippuu hyvasta keskinaisesta yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Kausi 2 osa 10/13. Osa kaupunkilaisista on kyllastynyt hetkisen maailman sykkeeseen ja haluaa muttaa maalle. Maaseudulla asumisessa on kuitenkin erilaisia haasteita. Niinpa apuun kiitaa eras erityinen perhe. (Homestead Rescue, lifestyle, USA, 2019)

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Patikoimassa ollut metsanvartija sattuu samalle polulle puuman kanssa. Vihainen supikoira hyokkaa koiranulkoiluttajan paalle Vancouverissa.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Elainsuojelujarjesto Animal Defenders International on tyoskennellyt 40 vuotta sirkuselainten kieltamiseksi. Suurimmat pelastusoperaatiot tapahtuvat Perussa.

programme.title: Canopy Kings
programme.desc: Puumajoja tilaustyona rakentava Django Kroner aloittaa uuden rakennuksen Kentuckyssa. Asiakas haluaa majan yli 20 metrin korkeuteen, joten Django lahtee ottamaan oppia sirkuksesta.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: ! Kausi 1, osa 1. Suunnittelija Antonio Ballatore rakastaa elaimia. Hanen intohimonaan on yhdessa tiiminsa kanssa kunnostaa ransistyneita ja ahtaita koteja seka niiden pihoja uuteen, elain- ja ihmisystavallisempaan kuosiin. (Animal Cribs, lifestyle, USA, 2017)

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: PSPCA:n elainlaakarit hoitavat huskyn niskassa olevaa syvaa haavaa. Kaksi koiraa pelastetaan hylatylta takapihalta, jonne ne oli jatetty myrskyn jalkoihin ilman suojaa.

programme.title: Philadelphian elainpoliisit
programme.desc: PSPCA:n virkailijat epailevat, etta eras mies kasvattaa koiranpentuja kellarikerroksessa Philadelphiassa. Olosuhteet ovat ala-arvoiset, ja tiimi aikoo lopettaa touhun.

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: Joukkueen jasen on poissa pelista, ja Russellin ja Mireyan on jatkettava vihjeiden etsimista keskenaan. Ensimmaiset potentiaaliset todisteet isojalasta loytyvat.

programme.title: Treasures Decoded
programme.desc: The chilling discovery of 30 massacred bodies on a Swedish Island reveals an ancient Nordic murder mystery - the story of how a warrior tribe was brutally murdered by their rivals. 2/6

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: A wind driven wildfire consumes a Colorado neighbourhood. In New Mexico, freezing conditions trap 21 people in an ice-covered tram car and an outbreak of tornados, rip through communities in the state of Alabama.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: With limited daylight, Alaskans must brave cruel temperatures to secure their survival. Storms make essentials like finding water supplies and pelts urgent.

programme.title: Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Actor Stephen Mangan and comedian Lara Ricote, who have never met before, aim to reach the northernmost point of Australia. 4/8

programme.title: Secrets of the Superagers
programme.desc: Michael Mosley meets a 73-year-old jazz musician in Chicago and discovers why playing music can prevent the hearing loss. He also reveals why aerobic exercise can help prevent the onset of glaucoma.

programme.title: Fishing Impossible
programme.desc: A maverick fishing crew take on ten adrenaline-filled fishing trips around the world. Their first stop is Kenya.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: A wind driven wildfire consumes a Colorado neighbourhood. In New Mexico, freezing conditions trap 21 people in an ice-covered tram car and an outbreak of tornados, rip through communities in the state of Alabama.

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Steve is in search of one of the most spectacular events on earth - bait balls. These wildlife events are so epic that they can be seen from space - but they wont be easy to find.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben Fogle is reunited with seafarer Rick, who has moved on to pastures new since their original encounter. When Rick last appeared on the series, he was living off the coast of French Polynesia, but he has since made a fresh start on the Pacific island of Fiji.

programme.title: Changing Planet
programme.desc: In the second year of a seven-year project, six presenters chart the fight to save the planets endangered ecosystems. In this episode, we visit the Maldives, USA and Greenland.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Special compilation episode following seven people who live in one of the worlds loneliest places. They must overcome snow storms, frozen terrain and limited resources to survive.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben meets Jake Williams, a 70-year-old hermit living on the edge of a forest in the Cairngorms, who has made a home on the site of an ancient settlement and enjoys a diet of roadkill stir fry.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace explores the secrets of the Guinness brewery in Dublin to reveal how it makes two million litres of Irish stout every single day. Plus, Cherry Healey visits a water treatment centre to learn how Dublin gets clean drinking water.

programme.title: The Space Shuttle That Fell to Earth
programme.desc: Nasa engineers spot a piece of debris striking the shuttle during launch. In space, the crew continue their mission, unaware of the concerns, but the clock is ticking to re-entry.

programme.title: Egyptian Tomb Hunting
programme.desc: Tony Robinson enters tombs that have been sealed shut for thousands of years, and discovers hieroglyphs that have only ever been seen by the ancient Egyptians who created them.

programme.title: Walking With Dinosaurs
programme.desc: At the edge of the Moroccan Sahara, an international team of palaeontologists lead by Dr Nizar Ibrahim has uncovered the bones of one of the largest predatory dinosaurs that ever walked the Earth: a Spinosaurus.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Sue pursues a bear. Jessie hunts small game. The Hailstones build a sled for baby Wade. Glenn hunts a moose.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben Fogle is reunited with seafarer Rick, who has moved on to pastures new since their original encounter. When Rick last appeared on the series, he was living off the coast of French Polynesia, but he has since made a fresh start on the Pacific island of Fiji.

programme.title: The Misadventures of Romesh Ranganathan
programme.desc: In this episode Romesh Ranganathan travels to Mongolia - a country which he has almost no prior knowledge of, save for the fact that it is famously in the middle of nowhere. Landing in the capital Ulaanbaatar, Rom spends a week exploring this vast nation, guided by local entrepreneur and TV host Ider Od, seeing an enormous statue of the countrys iconic Genghis Kahn, visiting an energy centre in the middle of the desert and finding out how nomadic people meet a future partner, when their nearest eligible neighbour might live 100 miles away. Along the way he takes in ancient Shaman rituals, bizarre mystery statues, tries his hand at Mongolian wrestling and takes part in his own vegan eagle hunting trip. But Romesh also encounters a country of contradictions. It is full of vast empty open spaces and yet Ulaanbaatar has traffic calming measures to control the unbearable congestion. It is the most sparsely populated country on earth - a vast wilderness, almost untouched by man. But is there actually anything worth seeing there? And would Rom recommend it as a holiday destination?

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace visits the Lush factory in Dorset to learn how an astonishing 14 million bath bombs are produced every year. Plus, Cherry Healey learns how taking a hot bath can provide benefits.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Sue is on the hunt for food, but shell have to compete with a wily fox. Jessies puppies embark on their first big camping trip, and Ricko crashes his snowmobile.

programme.title: Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Ed Gamble and Lou Sanders have been friends for years, so much so that shes bought a his n hers set of driving gloves to tackle their most dangerous road - 1000 kilometres of Iceland. 5/8

programme.title: Secrets of the Superagers
programme.desc: Dr Michael Mosley travels the world to meet extraordinary superagers. In this episode about the appearance, Michael is in Los Angeles to meet a 71-year-old with amazing, wrinkle free skin.

programme.title: Fishing Impossible
programme.desc: In British Columbia, our trio must work out how to catch a Coho Salmon without becoming a grizzlys dinner.

programme.title: Treasures Decoded
programme.desc: New investigations at Pompeii reveal a dark underbelly of lawlessness, murder and political intrigue. Could this explain the mystery of dozens of bodies found sheltering in a warehouse? 3/6

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: Wildfires in Oregon, flash floods in Arizona, a family survive the most powerful typhoon to hit the Philippines and a story of survival in sub-zero temperatures for seven days in the Canadian Rockies.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: Wildfires in Oregon, flash floods in Arizona, a family survive the most powerful typhoon to hit the Philippines and a story of survival in sub-zero temperatures for seven days in the Canadian Rockies.

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Steve goes in search of the deadliest cats in Africa in the carnivore capital of Zambia. He gets up close to the rulers of the Savannah - the lions and leopards.

programme.title: The Misadventures of Romesh Ranganathan
programme.desc: In a festive special, Rom visits the Sahara Desert. Guided by Bobo, a local of Berber descent, Rom discovers a place that is vast and inhospitable, and utterly beautiful. 5/5

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben Fogle journeys to the foothills of the Indian Himalayas to live with former fighter pilot, Steve Lall, who is now a mountain farmer.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: The Hailstones work to repair a vital piece of equipment for their hunting grounds. Sue Aikens contends with the dangers of the tundra while hunting for small game.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace visits a colourful factory that produces 200,000 litres of paint and 10,000 metres of wallpaper every week.

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: A look at the survival techniques of creatures that endure the harsh conditions of the Arctic and Antarctic. For animals at both poles, life is dominated by the annual retreat and advance of the freezing sea ice and the challenge of surviving winters when temperatures drop. In the Arctic the polar bear is the top predator, catching seals on the ice and forcing seabirds to nest high up on cliffs. In Antarctica the flightless penguins have no ground-based predators to deal with but lurking in the water is the constant threat from leopard seals. Narrated by David Attenborough.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: In the Philippines, the Taal volcano violently erupts, blasting ash and spewing debris over nearby towns and villages. In Queensland, Australia, a freak hail storm unleashes a destructive assault on residents. In British Columbia, a snowmobile rider narrowly escapes death.

programme.title: The Future of Nature
programme.desc: Discussion about the impact grasslands have on capturing carbon.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Hidden Caribbean: Havana to Haiti
programme.desc: Joanna Lumley travels across two of the most enigmatic countries in the Caribbean - Cuba and Haiti. Joanna kicks off her adventure in the back of a classic car in Havana, outlining her 1500-mile Caribbean adventure.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: The Hailstones are faced with a life-or-death decision in high tide. Ricko DeWilde enlists the aid of his children to maintain the family homestead. 16/16

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben travels to the canyons of Utah to meet 72-year-old twins Bill and Bob Stone, who fled their adrenaline-junkie pasts for a tough subsistence lifestyle as they also deal with the challenges associated with growing old. He joins the brothers as they go cattle-wrangling, rock climbing and skydiving, while Ben also discovers more about them and why they decided to cut themselves off from civilisation. Once parachute instructors, police informants and bounty hunters, they are now organic farmers who are preparing for doomsday.

programme.title: The Blue Planet
programme.desc: David Attenborough narrates a natural history of the oceans. This programme explores seasonal changes in the richest waters on Earth, where the annual cycle of the sun drives an explosion of life. Featuring an extraordinary variety of marine animals, including seals, dolphins, jellyfish and the bizarre walking handfish.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Paddy McGuinness visits a factory that makes 4 million individual Belgian chocolates every day. Ruth discovers the origin of St Nicholas and later visits a chocolate museum.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: The Alaskans embrace change as winter loosens its icy grip on the Arctic.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild

programme.desc: The team heads to the icy, barren mountains of Patagonia in search of a deep-sea delicacy, the Patagonian Toothfish, which sells for $100 per kilo in the fish markets of North America.

programme.title: The Misadventures of Romesh Ranganathan
programme.desc: All Romesh knows about Colombia is cocaine barons and for most of his life, that was more than enough to stop him wanting to visit. But is Colombias reputation for drug wars justified? 4/5

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 tuntia ...
programme.desc: Sarjan toisessa jaksossa Richard Ayoade vie meidat viuhuen saalimattoman tehokkaalle lomalle Pariisiin. Yhdessa juontaja ja koomikko Mel Giedroycin kanssa he tukeutuvat viikonlopuksi eleganttiin hotelliin, joka tuli kuuluisaksi paikkana, jossa Oscar Wilde kuoli. Mutta tiukan aikataulun ja monien hoideltavien nahtavyyksien takia ei ole aikaa jaada hengailemaan ja imemaan itseensa kirjallista ilmapiiria, joten he kayvat suoraan kasiksi kulttuuriin upottautumiseen. Valttaen Eiffel-tornia pitkine hissijonoineen he suuntaavat Montparnassen torniin, josta on luultavasti parempi nakoala Pariisiin ja joka tarjoaa bonuksena Eiffel-tornin. He syovat vankan ranskalaisannoksen vasikanpaapataa ja etanoita kaupungin vanhimmassa kahvilassa ennen kiihdyttamista lyhyelle skootterikierrokselle. He suuntaavat absinttiin erikoistuneeseen baariin ja paattavat paivan siihen ennen kuin hallusinaatiot alkavat. Toisena paivana nahdaan Mel kuin kotonaan Le Cordon Bleun kokkikoulun keittion tutussa ymparistossa, jossa he osallistuvat kolmituntiseen tyopajaan. Myohemmin katutaidekierros antaa heidan arvostaa taidetta ilmaiseksi ja samalla tutustua viela yhteen kaupungin alueeseen. Richard ikuistaa matkan eksklusiivisella matkamuistolla.

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 tuntia ...
programme.desc: Richard Ayoaden kanssa 48 tunniksi Tanskan tyylitietoiseen paakaupunkiin Koopenhaminaan lahtee Noel Fielding. Pyoraily on suosiossa Koopenhaminassa, joten he liittyvat pyorailykierrokselle paastakseen vauhtiin ja nahdakseen niin monta nahtavyytta kuin mahdollista laskeutumatta pyoran selasta, mutta edes he eivat pysy nopean matkaoppaan vauhdissa. Yhdessa he syovat paikallisia voileipia ja pysahtyvat tanskalaisille leivonnaisille kaupungin vanhimpaan leipomoon. Juomat tulevat tuoppien muodossa Carlsbergin panimomuseossa, jossa he osallistuvat gastronomisiin oluen maistajaisiin. He saavat jannitysta Tivolissa, maailman viidenneksi vanhimmassa huvipuistossa, jossa pelottomat matkaajat menevat suoraan puiston suosituimpaan laitteeseen Rutschebaneniin, 102-vuotiaaseen puiseen vuoristorataan. He tutustuvat joihinkin Koopenhaminan katkettyihin jalokiviin, kuten Cisternsiin, maanalaiseen nayttelytilaan, ja uskaltautuvat itsehallintoiseen Christianian hippien turvapaikkaan. Kun heidan aikansa Tanskan paakaupungissa on paattymassa, he suuntaavat Rundetaarniin, Euroopan vanhimpaan observatorioon tuomaroimaan Koopenhaminaa ja yhteista aikaansa.

programme.title: The Heroic Quest of the Valiant Prince Ivandoe
programme.desc: In an attempt to win the hand of Princess Jezabel, Boaris Von Tusk stages a tournament to prove that he is the greatest warrior in all The Five Kingdoms. programme.desc: When Gumball and Darwin investigate a missing classmate, they discover a far greater mystery . . . about Elmore. programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isnt invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party - even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Bean’s trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and he’s not a happy bunny.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre – bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesn’t like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he can’t refuse.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpie starts coaching Sumush to become fitter, faster, stronger, it unleashes a new Mushpie: one who demands excellence and full commitment! Poor Sumush!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: To Truff, making music comes effortlessly. So when he needs to put in a big effort to make a ‘forest song’, it affects him in unusual ways.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit loves Chanterelles art so much. But when Chanterelle makes a statue of Lilit, she cant stand it. Does Lilit tell the truth or does she just carry on pretending to like it?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Our Mushlers learn that Mushpie absolutely cannot resist an adorable look. And now everyone is using their adorable power to get Mushpie to do what they want!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chanterelle absolutely loves everything about bark-boarding ... until she tries it!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Everyone thinks that Puff has done what no Mushable has ever done before -- touched Muddlers mud pile. But has he really?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a documentary on salmon, whereas the Lemmings want to dance it up in the garage, nightclub style. TV versus music, the sonic war has begun!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A confrontation between Grizzy and the Lemmings leads to a room in the castle tower. The bear accidentally sets off a mechanism and discovers a large medieval magic trunk.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When the Lemmings spoil Grizzys meal with their new game, the bear evicts them far from the cabin. They crash onto a faraway picnic table.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are holding a log throwing competition that stops short when Grizzy sends them soaring into the distance.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the TV remote control. The argument leads the bear to the summit of the castle tower during a storm.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a whale of a time revamping the paintings on display in the castle by painting themselves alongside the illustrated noblemen.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy puts a stop to the Lemmings furious rodeo game on a sheep. Annoyed, they decide to banish the bear to the bottom of the castle dungeons while hes taking a nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While fighting over a jelly cake, Grizzy banishes the Lemmings to the castle dungeons and the rodents discover a passageway leading to a secret elfin room.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to the theatre to see a performance by a celebrated hypnotist Dr Daze. Bean is super keen to come up on stage and be part of the show. But after being hypnotized Bean unknowingly leaves the theatre not realizing that he is still under the influence and certain trigger sounds have him doing silly things at unexpected and embarrassing moments.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a stubborn bird deliberately defecates his Mini, Mr. Bean washes it. After the passing motorist mistakenly thinks that Bean runs a car wash, Bean makes some makeshift car washing equipment at the side of the road. Mrs. Wicket joins Bean by offering tea to the motorist. Soon after, Bean is washing cars that belong to the Royal Queen but the same bird defecates on the car.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wickets flat but her sideboard tumbles over, and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it, he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realising that it is only his landladys furry hat, Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vet in a desperate attempt to save his feline friends life.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean plays gooseberry when Mrs Wicket falls in love with a man Mr Bean doesn’t trust.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they won’t forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. He’s so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares – with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers’ home-tree isn’t big enough to store all of Chep’s collections. So Chep goes all around Mushton to find a new home for them – and no way he’s letting them move out without him!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush is the champ of finding Mushables in their version of ‘hide-and-seek’ – ‘Hide your Hat’. The last one he needs to find is Mushpot. But Mushpot is the champ of hiding!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: With Sumush out of town, both Mush-Mush and Fung think that they are now the strongest Mushables in Mushton. But neither of them counts on the strength of Lilit and Miff!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is super happy to have Amanita become a collector as well. Until she starts getting better at collecting than he is!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Our Mushlers discover a super-sticky tree sap and use it to have lots of fun… until Mush-Mush gets stuck to Muddler’s back.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Inspired by a magazine with a jewellery ad showing a man offering a diamond to a woman, Grizzy imagines himself offering the rangers engagement ring to his beloved she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When he accidentally sticks a computer microprocessor to his temple, Grizzy is transformed into an exceptionally intelligent being.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy gleefully discovers that he can print images taken with the rangers camera which is connected to a state-of-the-art printer. He decides to immortalize and frame himself…

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A van pulls up to the rangers cabin to deliver a crate of jars of chocolate spread. While Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a wrecking bar to open it, someone steals the crate.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Like usual, Grizzy picks the door of the Rangers log cabin to come in and make himself comfortable, but this time its impossible to enter! The Lemmings have requisitioned the cabin for a party and barricaded themselves inside. Grizzy has no intention of waiting for an invitation to find a way to get in.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have got their hands on a pack of white beans which have very strange properties: when mixed with soda, anyone who eats them turns into a bouncing ball.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. But the Lemmings discover a remote-control device that can modify the balls weight. By setting it on maximum, the ball could knock over much more than pins: furniture, a bear and even a log cabin!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings inherit a crate that fell off a Canadian army convoy. Inside, a case emits a sort of laser beam that divides objects into multiple miniaturized versions of themselves.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Near the supermarket a machine hands out surprise eggs in exchange for a coin. Amongst the lots to be won, there is a super firework rocket the Lemmings dream of, and a piece of costume jewelry that Grizzy imagines himself giving to his lady-love.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean dog-sits for Irma and while in the park comes across a professional dog-walker. This guy’s making a fortune while Bean is doing it for free! That evening posters go up and the next morning Bean has four dogs to look after. But who is going to walk whom?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor. The car smells Teddy smells Bean smells … bad. He comes home determined to clean all three. A determination that winds up with him locked outside on the roof and completely stark naked.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy expels the Lemmings from the cabin where they had built a cumbersome obstacle course. Peaceful at last and feeling lazy, he is determined not to leave his couch. The Lemmings discover a magic Mayan disc that allows you to choose instantaneous mutations of other animals’ features: bat wings, reindeer antlers, elephant trunks, etc. The mutant Lemmings return to the cabin, determined to continue playing their game while enjoying their new accessories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As they fight over the last jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings accidentally send it flying deep into the jungle. They both set out in search for the jar, but in a forest that dense, it’s an impossible mission. In a Mayan Temple, the Lemmings discover a magic bracelet that increases one’s sense of smell tenfold and use it to find the jar. Grizzy loses their trail, but finds some Mayan bracelets himself: one for eyesight and one for hearing. Enough to infallibly track down the Lemmings!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Just as Grizzy is about to go to bed, he ousts the Lemmings who are holding a surprise party in the cabin. The Lemmings land in a Mayan Temple devoted to the moon. While toying with an ancestral console, the Lemmings set off a cosmic phenomenon that brings the moon, which is now the size of a disco ball, to the temple. In its aura, gravity becomes very weak. Enough to get rid of Grizzy and have a very original fiesta.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy does his best to get rid of the Lemmings and enjoy some peace and quiet in the cabin, but each time they come back with a new and even more-disturbing activity. When he sees some penguins marching in a perfectly disciplined line, Grizzy decides to teach the Lemmings how to behave in his presence. He locks himself up with them inside the garage, which has been transformed into an elementary school classroom. Grizzy is determined to make discipline reign but he has forgotten about the Lemming’s natural penchant for bedlam.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight once again and cause an accident with Santa Claus’ sled. The Lemmings rush to the crash site and get their hands on Santa’s magic bag. While Grizzy is tidying up the cabin after their fight, he is baffled to see the Lemmings come back him, quiet and calm. The rodents break out into Christmas carols and prepare a delicious snack for Grizzy before slipping out again. Suspicious, Grizzy follows them and discovers that the bag rewards persons whose wishes are equal to their goodwill.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings do not agree on which program to watch on TV. Grizzy confiscates the remote-control device. He thinks he’s won the battle, but the Lemmings find another one at the research station. A furious combat begins until the adversaries realize that the research station device has a special button that controls objects.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Ducky and Quizz steal the Bat-Signal’s one-of-a-kind lightbulb, Bam and Batwing must find a way to restore the legendary light so Batman knows when Gotham needs him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Kitty is staying over at the Batcave for a sleepover, but getting her to lie down for a catnap is no easy task as the Batwheels have to find creative ways to get her to sleep.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird learns a lesson in asking for permission when he takes one of Buffs stuffed animals without asking. When the stuffed animal accidentally gets swiped by the Legion of Zoom, Redbird will have to rescue the stuffed unicorn or admit to Buff what he did.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is covered in super bouncy Bounce X goo during a chase with Prank, he must learn to use his newfound bouncing abilities to his advantage. / Bam must learn to adapt and try something new as he’s tasked to dive the Bat Big Rig all the way to Star City, while the Legion of Zoom chases after him.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Mayor Leghorn to build the venue for the Looney Games. They soon become overwhelmed by the job and must ask for help.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pete Puma hires The Looney Builders to build a roller disco for Looneyburg. Lola is new to roller skating, but doesn’t want to take it slow and practice.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: David wants to play video games all day, but Barney suggests a physical activity that gets all the kids involved; David then understands the importance of balancing these two types of entertainment.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Vivie fears shes jeopardized Nonnas love after she accidentally knocks over Nonnas flower pots. During an adventure in the Enchanted Garden, Barneys big mistakes ruin their fun and Vivie realizes the power of unconditional love.

programme.title: Lu And The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.desc: The bugs talk about times they felt both happy and sad.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The Cat and Mouse are hired to find out who absconded with Hoops McJumpalots lucky high top sneakers.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Spike get glued together.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is placed in charge of caring for the Duchess French Poodle and needs Tuffy and Jerrys help in keeping the ill-tempered mutt under control.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Things get crazy down on the farm when a cat and mouse pursuit leads Jerry to hide his turtle egg in a hens nest.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Papa tells his fractured version of the Jack and the Beanstalk story to the Bavarian mouse trio.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: To Tom and Jerrys delight Gingers new no junk food in the house diet causes Rick to sleep walk every night to the local fast food joint.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a top-secret Canadian Army prototype that allows you to pass through solid surfaces for a window of several seconds. How can Grizzy prevent the "infiltrating" Lemmings from stealing his jar of chocolate spread?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have found an Amerindian eagle amulet that endows he who wears it with the powers of a bird of prey. Grizzy would like to impress his beloved she-bear by soaring majestically through the sky. But to confiscate the magic totem from the Lemmings, who are now as sharp as eagles, Grizzy will have to use the cunning... of a puma.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with the rangers electric guitar and the cabin walls tremble with their experimental rock. Just as Grizzy is about to destroy the instrument, he realizes it can make harmonious sounds too. Will this be enough to seduce the she-bear hes in love with?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To finally be on an equal footing with Grizzys imposing build and throw their own weight around in the cabin, the Lemmings decide to wear a blowup sumotori costume. Grizzy is roughly chucked out of the living room area. He decides to follow a special sumo diet to become the strongest guy around.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover an ancient Amerindian table with the power to show you past events. They relive their prehistoric ancestors first confrontations, and learn that chocolate spread was invented long, long ago.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover an old book of magic spells with a formula that enables one to take on the appearance of any other creature. The Lemmings have the bright idea of transforming one their kin into a double of the she-bear Grizzy is madly in love with in order to trick him. How could Grizzy refuse to give his jar of chocolate spread to his sweetheart?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput can’t stop reading and gets caught! Back at the lab, the story intrigues everyone who is brought on a captivating adventure – featuring Lamput, Specs and Skinny in the leading role of a classic folktale. Robinput and his mates fight evil dictatorship for the perfect bedtime story.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: There’s Football Fever as the Docs and Lamput go to watch the game! In the second half of the game, they end up on the pitch! Lamput causes havoc for the Docs as he disguises himself as flags, jerseys, whistles and even the football, but as they get closer to the 90th minute, they realise that it’s a team effort to win, and the game needs everyone to be on the same side.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Pregnant Doc: During a chase, Specs accidentally swallows Lamput. The Docs plan to bring Lamput back to the lab! However, Specs gets misunderstood by bystanders as a pregnant mother in labor and gets dragged to a hospital against his will. While Specs gets used to being a mother-to-be, Skinny tries to get the two of them out of the hospital and back to the lab. Will Lamput stay in Spec’s tummy this whole time?Reverse: In a new attempt to catch Lamput, The Docs invent a remote that reverses anything back in time. Lamput must try to escape while constantly being pulled back into the Docs grasp!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself dogged by a young Japanese boy at the Science Museum. He takes an instant dislike to the Scallywag until he sees what the kid has in his backpack: gadgets so cool you cant even get them in the West. So when a security guard tries to ruin their fun they run away together to... Mars!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean cannot, for the life of him, place the face of the uninvited fat bloke on his doorstep. An old school photograph and school cap just about jog his memory. By this time his new ‘friend’ has put his feet up and is eating Bean out of house and home. This blast from the past proves to be a blasted pain in the neck.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputer’s motherboard. / When a group of alley dogs, aided by a heroic stray, are saved from Catwoman by kind-hearted Buff, he brings them all back to live in the Batcave. / Batwing and Goldie secretly decide to participate in the Gotham Air-Show. / Bam brings Catwomans Catmobile to life so the Batwheels can have even teams for their game of "Bat-Ball".

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After agreeing to swap motherboards and change bodies, the Batwheels have to quickly learn to “drive a mile in each other’s wheels” in time to stop the approaching Legion of Zoom!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has some competition with Nightwing’s motorcycle, Nightbike. These stunt bikes will need to learn that they’re better when they work together. / After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from strealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Ducky and Quizz steal the Bat-Signal’s one-of-a-kind lightbulb, Bam and Batwing must find a way to restore the legendary light so Batman knows when Gotham needs him.

programme.title: Barneys World - Meet Barney
programme.desc: Baby Bop is playing a game of hide and seek behind the Barney Bench! With a little Barney magic, she shows off a couple of her dress-up costumes and skills, all while celebrating her fabulous self.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Bugs, Lola, Daffy, Porky and Tweety utilise their vehicles to tackle construction projects, all the while acquiring valuable insights.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Penelope Pussycat to build a fashion runway in France where they are encouraged to make their design bigger and more fun.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wicket’s nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean thinks he’s just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden and goes rushing off to the Museum to have it valued.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV. Bean is unimpressed until Declan shows off all the cars features. Undeterred, Bean professes his car superior. Declan issues a challenge -to see which car Irma will choose for her lift back to work. Bean decides his car may need a little pimping ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Boundcourse. She refuses to go, but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. The two start a competition to see who will win the trophy. Bean is a relentless competitor, winning everything up until the point things start getting out of hand ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy have no plans, so decide to stay in bed all day. Mr Bean is determined that his feet can’t touch the ground, so he pushes the bed around with a broom. He has to find ingenious ways to make his tea and toast for breakfast, brush his teeth and an even bigger challenge of ordering a pizza and collecting it from downstairs without getting out of bed!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While trying to stop the Lemmings from playing their extreme trampoline game, Grizzy slips on the canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. Seeing that she wants more, Grizzy decides to become a champ in the sport. But for that to happen, the Lemmings will need to let him work out.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have hitched up a racoon with a sweet tooth to their sled and get a ride by throwing cookies in front of the creature with a sling. To recover the supply of cookies, which were to be his afternoon snack, Grizzy has no qualms about making the Lemmings sled skid out of control. When the sled hits a superheros spacecraft, a mysterious costume falls out.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings come up with a ride worthy of a county fair in the living room. Awakened, Grizzy throws their juice extractor out the window and the rodents land in the neighboring science station where they accidentally wake up… a mammoth! A friendship is born between them. The Lemmings drag the mastodon into their game, and he transforms the entire cabin into a Ferris Wheel. Grizzy, who was trying to doze in peace, wakes up in a panic.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play with poseable figurines of wild Canadian animals. When Grizzy sees that the bear figurine has been put inside a little cage, whereas those of the Lemmings are gathered around a mini-jar of chocolate spread, he decides to join in the party and take control of his own figurine.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a new generation Tamagotchi game on the Rangers tablet: the camera scans the player and gives him a virtual avatar of himself to take care of.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings find a native American Indian vase with a genie inside that will make anyones dreams come true, if they only let him out by rubbing the vase. There is nonetheless one little snag: the effects of the genies magic instantly wear off as soon as he returns to his vase and the lid shuts.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings get their hands on a secret weapon that belongs to the Canadian Army: anyone hit with it becomes non-violent. They use the arm to transform Grizzy into a cherub, despite himself.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a super fun app that allows you to see yourself as a rabbit or a robot or else decked out with lots of animated accessories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When they find a book on Japanese origami, the Lemmings churn out paper birds to play gliding games. Grizzy realizes that he could make the butterfly on the cover for his beloved she-bear.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The butler asks Tom to rid the upstairs of a mouse before the owners return. If Tom succeeds, hell live and work the rest of his life upstairs.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry find themselves in a garden growing contest – that turns out badly for Tom.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom has planned an afternoon rendezvous with Toodles.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Dr. Bigby upgrades Bot to a Bot-y Guard. When Tom breaks in and sets off Bots defensive systems, things get out of control and Bot terrorizes the whole lab crew. Jerry and Napoleon must figure out how to disarm Bot without hurting him.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When the witches herb garden is destroyed, Tom sets a trap to capture the pest responsible. Quackers helps him but is unknowingly the pest Tom seeks to capture.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom and Jerry lose Gingers wedding ring down the drain, they send Jerry through the pipes to retrieve it, but the drain leads out to the beach!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Dr. Bigby creates an amazing helmet that accidentally turns Tom into a genius. Napoleon, Jerry and Hamster all work together to take down the newly smart Tom who is now building a mouse-destroying weapon.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A leisurely stroll in the park turns into a run when Mr. Bean is chased home by an angry Mime Artist. He is lost for more words than usual when the street performer makes himself at home and insists on being wined and dined. Bean ousts the pest from his house using the only language mime artists understand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Chaotic cartoon capers following the further adventures of the popular halfwit immortalised in the live-action TV series and Hollywood films. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is bored of queuing for a trampoline park, so secretly bounces in through a window using a trampette. But he soon gets on the wrong side of a young show-off boy who keeps stealing Teddy and throwing him in hard-to-reach spots. To settle their row, they agree on a race around the trampoline park – first place wins Teddy. Will Mr Bean triumph before he’s chucked out for jumping the queue?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is struggling to sell items from her knitwear stall at the market, so sends Mr Bean to collect a sheep costume he can wear to attract customers. Once at the fancy dress shop however, Mr Bean gets stuck in the sheep costume and has to travel back to the market wearing it. Things go from bad to worse when Mr Bean takes a short cut across the field and gets caught up in a flock of real sheep!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: MOE wants to know what its like to be a member of the Batwheels, but the bot gets more than he bargained for when Bam invites him along for an exciting mission to stop Poison Ivy.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam brings Catwomans Catmobile, Kitty, to life so the Batwheels can have even teams for their game of "Bat-Ball," but the Kitty "Kitty" is too wild to be contained, despite Bams best attempts to convince her to play along.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Everyone assumes that Harley Quinn is the culprit in a recent burglary. But as Batman and Bam pursue Harley, Bibi and Redbird begin to suspect that she may actually be innocent.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff trains with Batwing to improve his gracefulness and uses her lessons on a delicate mission against the Riddler.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam cant wait to recharge after a long night of heroism in Gotham, but first, the Batwheels need all kinds of help, delaying his much-needed nap just a little bit longer...

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: While on an Enchanted Jungle trek, David loses the friends’ magical explorer mobile, after promising to remember where they parked it. Barney helps David learn its okay to make mistakes and the responsible thing to do is try to fix them.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Billys big, boisterous energy causes accidental destruction during the kids farm-play. Barney and the kids help him re-channel his exuberant strength more productively so they can all enjoy playing together.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: With their endless battles over the rangers cabin which they do not want to share, Grizzy and the Lemmings end up blowing the cabin up. Amidst the debris, they discover a strange pack: an army tent with all the necessary equipment to recreate a "home" in nature. Its the chance to discover the joys of camping in the wild.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings encounter a white bear which has drifted all the way to them on a chunk of ice which is slowly melting. The bear makes a fabulous rodeo partner, he just needs enough ice to keep cool. Even a few ice cubes on his head are enough. The only obstacle to this beautiful friendship is Grizzy, who considers himself master of the fridge and thus of the cabins ice production.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the rangers heavy trunks, which he immediately clears out of the cabin, his enemies stuck to it like stickers. What he doesnt know, is that the trunk contains a multifunction drone, complete with joystick and virtual reality headset, which enables "embedded" piloting. Thanks to this cutting-edge technology, the Lemmings decide to regain control of the situation!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a strange pond in an American Indian grotto that has the power to rejuvenate anyone who dips in it. They spray a bit of the water of youth onto Grizzy and he instantly turns into a harmless cub they can easily rid themselves of. But the effects of the waters are only temporary.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings happen on a native American Indian burial place under the rangers cabin. When they accidentally activate a magic disk representing the earth, they are sent back in time to the prehistoric era...

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: In order to please Boss, the Docs plan to catch Lamput to surprise him on his birthday, but it looks like their colleagues have the same idea. A fierce race begins!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Victory! The Docs finally catch Lamput but the timing could not be worse, because Boss Mom is here to visit and she does not take kindly to her friend Lamput being imprisoned. Against his better judgement but to please his mother, Boss orders the Docs to chaperone and serve Boss Mom and Lamput as they spend time shopping, being pampered and spoiling themselves. Lamput cant believe his luck and the Docs cant believe theirs either! But when Boss Mom finds herself in mild peril, theres a chance of redemption and the possibility of a her finding a new favourite.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs And Skinny are late to work and Boss is mighty angry! The Docs cook up a quick, fake story of how they were chasing Lamput all over the city. It was a real tough chase across various terrains and thats what got them late to work!Boss calmly hears out their story and then opens his cabinet to show Lamput already caught and sitting there in a jar! The Docs sweat! We now see the Docs running all over the various terrains of the city with Boss chasing them on his scooter!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Whilst trying to redecorate the hall, Bean is obstructed at every turn by his landlady’s vile one-eyed cat. Bean pops it in the dustbin to keep it out of the way for a while. Just his luck that it’s rubbish collection day.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Nipping to the shops for a few provisions becomes a nightmare when a mile-long shopping list from his landlady and a clapped out trolley with a wonky wheel conspire to ruin his day. Subscribing to the theory that bigger is better, he constructs his own shopping trolley incorporating a petrol mower, pram wheels and an extra pair of hydraulic hands.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: It is a nice sunny day and Mr. Bean and Mrs. Wicket are relaxing in the garden, Mr. Bean attempts to sit beside her in the cool shade of her outdoor umbrella but Mrs. Wicket refuses. He decides to design his own umbrella for himself and Teddy. As he starts digging, he discovers - to his surprise - a bomb. He tries to disarm it, unfortunately, his attempt only accelerates its countdown.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to the theatre to see a performance by a celebrated hypnotist Dr Daze. Bean is super keen to come up on stage and be part of the show. But after being hypnotized Bean unknowingly leaves the theatre not realizing that he is still under the influence and certain trigger sounds have him doing silly things at unexpected and embarrassing moments.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Buffs trusty winch is knocked out of action by Poison Ivy, he must learn to improvise and come up with creative solutions on the fly.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Snowy and Jestah team up to execute a mysterious plan involving rare freeze-berries, Batwing and Buff pair up to take on the dastardly duo, but Batwing decides to carry out the mission herself, putting both her and Buff at risk.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger decides she wants to teach Tom to walk on a leash to ensure he gets much-needed exercise. Tom hates the leash and does not want to go for a walk. Finally, theyre on their way, much to Toms chagrin. Back home, Jerry and Tuffy proceed to raid the fridge.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger leaves some frozen fish on the kitchen counter to thaw. Ginger and Rick warn Tom to keep his paws away, or he will not get anything to eat. Soon, a live baby octopus crawls out of the mouth of one of the thawing fish and jumps off the counter, looking for a place to hide. Jerry befriends him and does his best to protect him from Tom.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick buys a drone that Tom and Jerry immediately put to use for their own high-jinks.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its time for the annual croquet tournament at the Manor. The butler tells Tom how important it is to the Lady of the Manor to always win…no matter what! The last thing they need is any pesky rodents interfering with the game. Knowing any sighting of Jerry or Tuffy would cast Tom in a bad light, hes determined to keep them off the lawn.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When Grizzy propels the Lemmings out of the log cabin perched on the Great Wall of China, the critters land on a small traditional house in a bamboo forest.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings love sesame nougat but Grizzy, who adores this treat too, steals their box. Quite upset, the rodents search for more, in vain. Instead, they discover the art of energy points in an old Chinese medicine book. Determined to recover their sweets regardless of the cost, the Lemmings activate Grizzys vital points and the bear finds himself completely blocked. Thanks to the book, Grizzy frees himself and learns to master energies in turn.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After a game that ends abruptly, the Lemmings fall onto the roof of a temple where they discover drawings of Tai Chi movements. When carried out, the exercises generate a ball of energy! The Lemmings test out the sequence of movements on… Grizzy, until he is evicted from the cabin and falls onto the temple in turn. His fall unveils a new sequence of movements on a fresco that could create an even stronger energy flow!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the tablet. During their scuffle, they knock over an army crate which falls into the middle of the bamboo forest surrounding the cabin.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create a shadow puppet show where seven papercut lemmings confront a bear over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread. The Lemmings in the audience are super enthusiastic, but Grizzy is outraged by the treatment inflicted upon the bear. He decides to intervene and equips the paper bear with an armor and saber! The Lemmings retort with ninja effigies of themselves and mount an attack to recover the coveted jar of Yummy spread.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As Grizzy relaxes in the massage chair, a cloud drifts in front of the sun, immediately stopping the electricity supply in the log cabin. The voltage drops continue, even though the sky seems clear now. Grizzy looks out the window and a dragon appears on the horizon! Once over his initial fright, the bear realizes that its only a kite flown by the Lemmings – using the electricity from the cabin they have rerouted!

programme.desc: As The Looney Builders build a giant claw game for Chibi Critter’s arcade in Japan, they discover the claw part is broken.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Ma and Pa Bear to build a bedroom for their son, Junior, whose excitement causes setbacks.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Gossamer extends a camping trip invitation to the Looney Builders; their plans for a basic campsite shift when Daffy convinces the group to experience glamping instead.
